The video clip showing two men in khaki: 2. The video was accompanied by a message in Hindi, which translated to "Fight over sharing the spoils of heavy fines collected."
A search using the keywords: पुलिस झगड़ा" (police fight) on Google led to an article on NDTV India, dated August 26, 2019, titled "Quarrel between PRD jawan and homeguard at Baraut police station; several blows landed." The article provided details of the incident, stating that it occurred at the Baraut police station in Baghpat district of Uttar Pradesh, and was related to the collection of fines for halting a vehicle for RTO inspection.
The Baghpat police: ANI, and Zee News also reported on the incident, confirming that the individuals involved in the scuffle were a home guard and a PRD jawan, not police officials. The police department initiated action against them based on the incident.
